item.title: Pot hole missing wooden bollard, 3rd August
item.description:
There is a deep pot hole on the green area by the pathway towards the set back houses at the top right hand side of Church hill wood road (as you look toward Poverest Road) My dog caught her leg down this pot hole and is a danger hazzard to both dogs and dog walkers as well as pedestrians.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Church Hill Wood, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amount of discarded litter, 3rd August
item.description:
On a visit to the Oval Sidcup today 3.8.25 I was appalled to see vast amounts of litter strewn all over the grass area. Please can this be cleared as soon as possible as it is making the area look rundown and unsightly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blackfen, London

item.title: Blocking the sun branches too long, 3rd August
item.description:
Russell park has many over grown branches that come into gardens. The trees are way too tall, and as I brought my property for south facing it is becoming a joke now that the trees are blocking my light and my washing is not drying. The branches are growing towards my garage. Russell park has not had any tree surgeons in years controlling the height the branches. Like I said my property I brought was for south facing for the sun in which I'm not getting now. So the tree surgeons need to come and cut the branches back and the height.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Garrard Close, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grass cutters damaging property/my home, 3rd August
item.description:
Damage to our property yet again. Have spoken to the grounds workers before but they change all the time. They are scratching our house plinth with their cutters. Luckily we haven’t had it painted yet or it would look worse. Originally they smashed/cracked our acco drainage and we replaced and didn’t complain. But this takes the piss. Is not the ride on mower I believe it’s the strimmers. When we spoke to them before they apologised and said they wouldn’t do it again but still are. This damage needs to be rectified at your expense.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Plaxtol Road, Lessness Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet
